original_title: 生撮り解禁ツアー むしられたビキニ
overview: Film by Seiji Izumi, 1985 with Seijo-tai aka Saints aka 聖女隊 (Eri, Mai, Ami). A trio of Japanese adult film actresses, who individually went under the names Mai (真衣), Eri (恵理) and Ami (亜美). Enjoy the tropical paradise of Saipan with the local Beach Boys!
tagline: "Sing, dance and take off!" Tropical SEX of the Saints!!!
title: Namadori kaikin tour: Mushirareta bikini
